Translations.Text: [God] said, "What has stopped you from bowing down when I commanded you?" He answered, "I am better than him. You created me out of fire, but you only created him out of clay
[God] said, "Get down from here, you are not allowed to be arrogant in this place. Get out, you are disgraced
Iblis said, "Give me until the day they will be resurrected
[God] replied, "You will have the time you want
Iblis said, "Now that You have caused me to fall into this, I will sit for them on Your straight path
I will come at them openly as well as secretly, from their right and from their left and You will find that most of them are ungrateful
[God] said, "Get out of here, you disgraced and disowned! As for those who will follow you, I will definitely fill Hell with all of you
And Adam, you and your wife will live in this garden, and both of you eat whatever you may wish, but do not approach this one tree or you will become unjust
Then, Satan whispered to them to expose their nakedness, which had been hidden from them, and he said, "Your Lord has forbidden you this tree so that you do not become angels or immortal
He swore to them, "I am a sincere advisor

and he succeeded in deceiving them. As soon as the two had tasted [the fruit] of the tree, their nakedness became obvious to them, and they started covering themselves with leaves from the Garden.Their Lord called to them, "Did I not forbid that tree to you and tell you, 'Satan is your clear enemy
